description:
Something is making people fall unconscious in an area around an expensive hotel owned by Chrome`s former colleague. Chrome sends Lloyd to fill in for lost manpower as a part-time job, but the rest of the usual gang end up there by coincidence.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose It`s Looking Like You Need to Clean Up the Mess, and You Kind of Saw It Coming?
Tatoeba Fuan ga Nai Wake de wa Nakatta ga Yappari Shirinuguri o Suru no wa Jibun ni Narisou na Yokan
たとえば不安がないわけではなかったがやっぱり尻拭いをするのは自分になりそうな予感
